summary: This mod adds the fortress of the Hornburg, better knows as Helms Deep to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
===============================================
-Description-
===============================================

This is the update on my older mod that adds the fortress of Helms Deep
It is fully navmeshed, uses custom textures but not custom meshes, and has npc's
It replaced Secunda's Kiss, sorry for this i made this a long time ago and chose that place since i didn't plan on releasing it.

===============================================
-F.A.Q-
===============================================

Q: Will this have quests?
A: Maybe in the distant future when
i'm better at making quests, scripts and such
________________________________________________
Q; Where is the Fortress located?
A: It replaces Secunda's Kiss near Whiterun
________________________________________________
Q: When are you going to update it?
A: One day

_________________________________________________
Q: How would this fit in game lore-wise?
A: See it as an old fortress that guards the way leading up to Bleak Falls Barrow.


==============================================
-Copyright and stuff-
==============================================
Credit goes to Osmodius for the textures
here is a link to his mod check it out he has alot of nice textures
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38058//?

The uruks in the screenshots are from the mod Third Era Wars. It adds uruk-hai, raiding parties across skyrim, but of course you could also just spawn alot of them at the fortress like i did. They should'n behave mentally challenged and charge at you on the bridge and in the fortress.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28522/?
author: Rilax
